name: Atelier Ayesha Plus: The Alchemist of Dusk
name_original: Atelier Ayesha Plus: The Alchemist of Dusk
description:
Atelier Ayesha has been powered up and comes to the PlayStation®Vita! We've included the additional contents from the PS3™ and added many more new and exciting elements for all to enjoy.
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
1 player(s)
1000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
